name: Diane MILNE and William J. Milne, as parents and natural guardians of Jeff Milne, a minor, Petitioners, v. Lawrence S. CROSSETT, M.D., and Shriners Hospital For Crippled Children, Philadelphia Unit, Respondents

parties: Diane MILNE and William J. Milne, as parents and natural guardians of Jeff Milne, a minor, Petitioners, v. Lawrence S. CROSSETT, M.D., and Shriners Hospital For Crippled Children, Philadelphia Unit, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 2nd day of December 1998, the Application for Relief to Enforce the Supreme Court’s Judgment is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
721 A.2d 42
Diane MILNE and William J. Milne, as parents and natural guardians of Jeff Milne, a minor, Petitioners, v. Lawrence S. CROSSETT, M.D., and Shriners Hospital For Crippled Children, Philadelphia Unit, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 2, 1998.
